meanings.definition: The quality of being visually attractive or pleasing in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The picturesqueness of the landscape took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the picturesqueness of the village in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The picturesqueness of the clown's outfit made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The picturesqueness of the old castle was like something out of a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the picturesqueness of the sunset over the ocean.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being picturesque.
meanings.sent1: We admired the picturesqueness of the small town nestled in the valley.
meanings.sent2: The picturesqueness of the garden made it a popular spot for weddings.
meanings.sent3: The picturesqueness of the situation was not lost on us.
meanings.sent4: The picturesqueness of her smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The picturesqueness of the snow-covered mountains was truly breathtaking.
